title: Bitcoin and Ethereum See 3% Gains as Halving Looms

title: Bitcoin experiences near-historic levels of net profit realization
description:
Quick Take Analyzing Bitcoin’s net profit/loss, a key metric calculated from the difference between realized gains and losses. Utilizing a seven-day moving average to sift through the noise and pinpoint a more accurate trend, Bitcoin’s net realized profit nearly matched its record high set in January 2021 – a whopping $3.8 billion. title: Binance’s successor in Russia CommEx announces closure
description: Binance’s buyer in Russia, CommEx, has declared a phased shutdown of its services without providing a reason for the decision. CommEx, a crypto exchange, which took over Binance’s Russian business following the latter’s departure from the country, has announced plans…

title: Bitcoin price at risk as long-term Investors move to sell $6.4 billion BTC
description: Bitcoin long-term investors were spotted moving 97,737 BTC on March 23. Here's how BTC price could react in the week ahead.

title: Solana vs. Ethereum: Evaluating Economic Security with SOL Founder’s Perspective
description: With Solana’s staked value crossing the $70 billion mark, industry leaders are debating whether it could be more secure than Ethereum, which has $108 billion in staked value.
